masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "They took the WHOLE TRUCK. Three months of donations—500 toys for kids in shelters and foster care. We were supposed to deliver tomorrow morning. The truck had a GPS but it's been disabled. These are kids who have NOTHING and now they'll have even less."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Track the stolen truck and recover the toys
  • Find out who did this—and why target a charity?
  • Get the toys back in time for Christmas delivery
